scripts.install:wc: yarn install && find packages/* -maxdepth 0 -type d -exec bash -c 'cd {} && yarn install' \;
scripts.uninstall:wc: rm -rf yarn.lock package-lock.json node_modules && find packages/* -maxdepth 0 -type d -exec bash -c 'cd {} && rm -rf yarn.lock package-lock.json node_modules .next' \;
scripts.reinstall:wc: npm run uninstall:wc && npm run install:wc
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
